title: Week in Review: Elon Musk's xAI buys X
body: Welcome back to Week in Review! Elon Musk says that xAI bought X in an all-stock deal; a16z-backed 11x faked some customers; the Lumon Terminal Pro pops

title: Tesla Shares Fall After Musk Merges xAI and X in All-Stock Deal Valued at $113 Billion
body: Tesla Inc. (TSLA, Financials) shares fell 3.5% Friday and extended losses by another 6% in premarket trading Monday after CEO Elon Musk said his artificial intelligence company xAI acquired social media platform X in an all-stock transaction.
